channel.title: Coming soon! LimePK
channel.description:
[center]Lime Pk[/center] USING COMPLEXITY X Pk Source! This Is Pk SERVER! ♦ Added Donator Zone. ::dzone for donators ♦ Added Full Torva, Pernix, Primal. ♦ Added Vesta long Sword, Primal 2h. ♦ Fixed Korasi Spec. ♦ Changed Shops. ♦ Added barrows. ::barrows ♦ Added Staff Zone. ::staffzone for admins. ♦ Added Slayer Zone. ::slayer ♦ Added More Customs, Like black phat, orange h ween, orange santa, white santa, white h'ween, and more.! ♦ Added Glaiving boots, steadfast boots, and ragefire boots! ♦ Added Veteran Cape. ♦ Fixed Donator Points. ♦ Added Some Shops, like "food supplies, range supplies, and more! " ♦ Added Giant Mole Zone ::mole ♦ Added ::ele , Chaos ele teleport. ♦ Fixed Monster Drop rate's, and drops. ♦ Added Vls Spec. ♦ Added Donator Box! Its give's awesome Items! ♦ Added Slayer Helm. ♦ Added Dragon Whip, Rune Whip, Adamant Whip, And Mithril Whip. ♦ Added And Fixed Armadyl Staff + runes. ♦ Added Chaotic LongSword. ♦ Added Death Cape.! ♦ Added Thieving Arena! ::thiev ♦ Added RockCrabs Arena! ::rocks ♦ Added Dagannoth Arena! ::daga ♦ Added kbd arena! ::kbd! ♦ And More! Some Pictures.
[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img15/4363/om0w.png[/img]
[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img834/2211/r1vo.png[/img]
[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img11/3263/41n4.png[/img]
HHHAATTEERRSS GGOONNAA SSMMDD. ! MORE PICTURES WILL BE ADDED TOMMOROW! Please be patiens! Contacts : skype: incaras If U need help, pm me.!
